TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement extends System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement
Public MustInherit Class ServiceModelSecurityTokenRequirement Inherits SecurityTokenRequirement

summary.span: 一个抽象类，可在实现该类时指定所要请求或进行身份验证的令牌的安全属性要求，这些要求是特定于 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 的。

span.span: An abstract class that when implemented specifies security property requirements of the token being requested or authenticated that are specific to Windows Communication Foundation (WCF).

summary.span: 安全令牌管理器会根据令牌需求，构造 WCF 安全处理器所使用的安全令牌提供程序和安全令牌身份验证器。

span.span: The security token manager constructs security token providers and security token authenticators that are used by the WCF security processor based on the token requirement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全令牌是一个经过加密签名的数据单元，可基于凭据传输身份验证和身份验证信息。A security token is a cryptographically signed data unit that transfers authentication and authorization information, based on a credential. 安全令牌管理器使用派生类来指定安全令牌需要包含的内容，例如密钥大小、密钥类型以及密钥的使用方式。The derived class is used by a security token manager to specify what is required of a security token, such as the key size, key type, and how the key can be used. 当确定某安全令牌符合指定条件后，可以创建 和 ，分别为传出的 SOAP 消息提供安全令牌，为传入的 SOAP 消息进行安全令牌身份验证。When a security token can be identified that matches the specified criteria, a and can be created to provide security tokens for outgoing SOAP messages and to authenticate security tokens for incoming SOAP messages, respectively. 例如，传出 SOAP 消息的默认安全令牌管理器具有 `CreateSecurityTokenProvider` 方法，该方法采用 参数，您可调用此参数获得与安全令牌提供程序匹配的安全令牌提供程序。For example, the default security token manager for outgoing SOAP messages has the `CreateSecurityTokenProvider` method that takes a parameter that can be called to obtain a security token provider that matches the security token provider. 此类的基类 包含一个字典 ，该字典可将属性名映射到属性值。This class's base class, , contains a dictionary, , which maps property names to their values. 此类包含大量名称以“Property”结尾的属性。This class has numerous properties whose name ends in the word "Property". 这些属性会返回一个字符串，该字符串是用来 `get` 或 `set` 字典中对应值的密钥。These properties return a string, which is the key used to `get` or `set` the corresponding value from the dictionary. 例如， 是 属性值的密钥。For example, is the key for the value of the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置为 `false`。The is set to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AuditLogLocationProperty As String
public: static property System::String ^ AuditLogLocationProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取令牌需求属性名，其值为记录身份验证结果时使用的审核日志的位置（仅限服务）。

span.span: Gets the token requirement property name whose value is the location of the audit log to use when recording the results of the authentication (service only).

value.span: 令牌要求属性字典中 AuditLogLocation 的密钥。

span.span: The key for the AuditLogLocation in the token requirement's Properties dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对应于此属性名的值的类型为 ，该类型是一个包含下列成员的枚举：The value that corresponds to this property name is of type , which is an enumeration with the following members: - ：操作系统事件日志中的应用程序日志。: The Application log in the operating system Event Log. - ：由操作系统确定的默认位置。: The default location, which is determined by the operating system. - ：事件日志中的安全日志。: The Security log in the Event Log.

public: static property System::String ^ ChannelParametersCollectionProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the token requirement property name whose value is the channel parameters collection (client only).

value.span: 令牌要求的“属性”字典中 的密钥。

span.span: The key for the in the token requirement's Properties dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对应于此属性名的值的类型为 。The value that corresponds to this property name is of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果生成令牌需求的通道是双工通道，则此属性包含双工通道侦听传入消息时使用的终结点地址。In case the channel that produces the token requirement is a duplex channel, this property contains the endpoint address on which the duplex channel is listening for incoming messages.

span.span: The key for the endpoint filter table property of the token requirement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对应于此密钥的值的类型为 ，其中泛型类型为 。The value that corresponds to this key is of type ,where the generic type is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property MessageAuthenticationAuditLevelProperty As String
public: static property System::String ^ MessageAuthenticationAuditLevelProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取令牌需求属性的密钥，其值为记录身份验证结果时使用的审核级别（仅限服务）。

span.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the audit level to use when recording the results of the authentication (service only).

value.span: 获取令牌要求属性的密钥，其值为记录身份验证结果时使用的审核级别。

span.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the audit level to use when recording the results of the authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对应于此密钥的值的类型为 ，该类型是一个包含下列成员的枚举：The value that corresponds to this key is of type , which is an enumeration with the following members: - ：仅记录失败的安全相关事件。: Only failed security-related events are recorded. - ：不记录任何事件。: No events are recorded. - ：仅记录成功的安全相关事件。: Only successful security-related events are recorded. - ：同时记录失败和成功的安全相关事件。: Both failed and successful security-related events are recorded.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property MessageDirectionProperty As String
public: static property System::String ^ MessageDirectionProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取令牌需求属性的密钥，其值为要使用的 枚举成员，该成员指示以何种方向发送的消息需要令牌提供程序：从客户端到服务器或从服务器到客户端。

span.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the member of the enumeration to use and that indicates whether the token provider is needed for messages sent from client to server or server to client.

value.span: 获取令牌要求属性的密钥，其值为要使用的 枚举成员。

span.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the member of the enumeration to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对应于此密钥的值的类型为 。The value that corresponds to this key is of type . 凭据实现可使用此属性来提供不同的令牌，用以处理请求和响应。This property can be used by credential implementations to provide different tokens for processing the request and the response. 以下的凭据实现就是一个例子：终结点可以指定一个证书专门用来对传出消息进行签名，指定另一个证书专门供其他各方用来加密消息。An example is a credential implementation where the endpoint can specify a different certificate that it signs outgoing messages with and a different certificate to be used by other parties to encrypt messages for it.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Selectors::SecurityTokenVersion ^ MessageSecurityVersion { System::IdentityModel::Selectors::SecurityTokenVersion ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Selectors::SecurityTokenVersion ^ value); };

value.span: 消息安全版本。

span.span: The message security version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含大量的属性，这些属性指定消息的不同组件的版本号。The contains numerous properties that specify version numbers of different components of a message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含大量的属性，这些属性指定消息的不同组件的版本号。The contains numerous properties that specify version numbers of different components of a message. 令牌提供程序和令牌身份验证器实现可使用 从终结点获取令牌（例如，用于安全对话）。The can be used by token provider and token authenticator implementations to obtain a token from the endpoint (for example, for secure conversation).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的 对象包含大量属性，这些属性指定要在特定条件下使用的安全算法。The object that is returned contains numerous properties that specify security algorithms to use in specific conditions. 它还描述该服务的各种安全功能。It also describes various security capabilities of the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是 SOAP 消息安全，则此属性包含生成令牌要求的绑定的安全绑定元素。In case of SOAP message security, this property contains the security binding element of the binding that produces the token requirement.

public: static property System::String ^ SecurityBindingElementProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取令牌需求属性的密钥，其值为用于创建通道的安全绑定元素。

span.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the security binding element used to create the channel.

value.span: 令牌需求属性的密钥，其值为用于创建通道的 。

span.span: The key for the token requirement property whose value is the used to create the channel.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SupportingTokenAttachmentModeProperty As String
public: static property System::String ^ SupportingTokenAttachmentModeProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取令牌需求属性的密钥，其值为关联的 枚举成员（如果请求适用于支持令牌）。

span.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the associated enumeration member if the request is for a supporting token.

value.span: 令牌需求属性的密钥，其值为关联的 枚举成员。

span.span: The key for the token requirement property whose value is the associated enumeration member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `SupportingTokenAttachmentMode` 属性是 枚举成员（如果请求适用于支持令牌）。The `SupportingTokenAttachmentMode` property is a member of the enumeration member if the request is for a supporting token. 支持令牌除了提供包含在绑定的主体令牌中的声明之外，还提供其他声明。Supporting tokens provide additional claims beyond those contained in the principal tokens for the binding.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SupportSecurityContextCancellationProperty As String
public: static property System::String ^ SupportSecurityContextCancellationProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取令牌需求属性的密钥，其值指示安全对话令牌是适用于安全会话（在这种情况下，该令牌的生存期取决于用户通道的生存期）还是适用于数据报安全通道。

span.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value indicates whether the secure conversation token is for a security session (in which case its lifetime is tied to the lifetime of the user's channel) or for a datagram security channel.

value.span: 令牌需求属性的密钥，其值指示安全对话令牌是否是可取消的。

span.span: The key for the token requirement property whose value indicates whether the secure conversation token should be cancelable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要求适用于安全对话令牌，则 `SupportSecurityContextCancellation` 包含一个值，该值指示安全对话令牌是否适用于安全会话（在这种情况下，其生存期与用户通道的生存期相关联）或用于数据报安全通道。When the requirement is for a secure conversation token, `SupportSecurityContextCancellation` contains a value that indicates whether the secure conversation token is for a security session (in which case its lifetime is tied to the lifetime of the user's channel) or for a datagram security channel.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SuppressAuditFailureProperty As String
public: static property System::String ^ SuppressAuditFailureProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取令牌需求属性的密钥，其值指示是否忽略记录身份验证结果时发生的错误（仅限服务）。

span.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value indicates whether to ignore errors that occur when recording the results of the authentication (service only).

value.span: 令牌需求属性的密钥，其值指示是否忽略记录身份验证结果时发生的错误。

span.span: The key for the token requirement property whose value indicates whether to ignore errors that occur when recording the results of the authentication.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property TargetAddressProperty As String
public: static property System::String ^ TargetAddressProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取令牌需求属性的密钥，其值为通道与之对话的终结点地址（仅限客户端）。

span.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the endpoint address that the channel is talking to (client only).

value.span: 令牌需求属性的密钥，其值为通道与之对话的 。

span.span: The key for the token requirement property whose value is the that the channel is talking to.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TransportScheme { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TransportScheme : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置传输方案。

span.span: Gets or sets the transport scheme.

value.span: 传输方案。

span.span: The transport scheme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是传输安全，则此属性包含生成令牌需求的 `TransportBindingElement` 的传输方案。In case of transport security, this property contains the transport scheme of the `TransportBindingElement` that produces the token requirement.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property TransportSchemeProperty As String
public: static property System::String ^ TransportSchemeProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 如果发出的请求是要在传输安全中使用令牌提供程序或令牌身份验证器，则此字符串为令牌需求属性的密钥，其值为传输方案。

span.span: If the request is made for a token provider/authenticator to be used with transport security, this string is the key for the token requirement property whose value is the transport scheme.

value.span: 令牌需求属性的密钥，其值为传输方案。

span.span: The key for the token requirement property whose value is the transport scheme.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property ViaProperty As String
public: static property System::String ^ ViaProperty { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取令牌需求属性的密钥，其值为通道与之连接的中转 URI（仅限客户端）。

span.span: Gets the key for the token requirement property whose value is the Via URI that the channel is connecting to (client only).

value.span: 令牌需求属性的密钥，其值为通道与之连接的中转 URI。

span.span: The key for the token requirement property whose value is the Via URI that the channel is connecting to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含中间目标的 URI。The property contains the URI of an intermediate destination.
